title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Opportunities
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Opportunities               Science & Research Opportunities       Cape Cod National Seashore has a robust and varied science program offering many opportunities to work with a professional staff of natural resource professionals. Internships Cape Cod National Seashore is a great place to do an internship. There are several Student Conservation Association (SCA) opportunities every year as well as volunteer internships. Search for internships offered through the SCA and other opportunities. Nickerson Fellowship The Friends of Cape Cod National Seashore sponsor The Joshua A. Nickerson Conservation Fellowship to provide funding for student research at the seashore. Read about the Nickerson Fellowship. Atlantic Research and Learning Center Opportunities The Atlantic Research and Learning Center (ARLC) has some more information on fellowships and internships. Check out the ARLC opportunities. Volunteer Volunteers play a big role at Cape Cod National Seashore. Find out about volunteer opportunities with our science staff.
